A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Two stars for some of the Rey/Kylo parts. Overall this was really bad for a star wars movie\, it felt like B-rate television masked with blockbuster cash. It's sad\, 93% critic reviews vs 56% audience\, Di$$ney magic in the critics pockets right there. Please don't waste your money\, this thing underperforming is the only satisfaction to be had from this franchise at this point. Don't forget to buy a porg.
